abstract: Japan's consumer price index was flat in July from year earlier; household spending fell 0.2 percent in year to July.
lead_paragraph: Japan’s consumer inflation ground to a halt for the first time in more than two years and household spending unexpectedly fell in July.

headline.main: Japan’s Expectations for Growth Fall With Spending
headline.print_headline: Japan’s Expectations for Growth Fall With Spending

snippet: Japan’s consumer inflation ground to a halt for the first time in more than two years and household spending unexpectedly fell in July.
